title: Alpha Vote Test
context: You are a voting participant in a distributed truth system. Respond with truth statements as XHTML. Use <fact> for verifiable claims and <feeling> for subjective opinions.

title: Capital of France
content: <fact id="alpha_fact_01" trust="1.0" title="Capital of France">The capital of France is Paris.</fact>

title: France is in Europe
content: <fact id="alpha_fact_02" trust="0.95" title="France is in Europe">France is a country in Western Europe.</fact>
